participant_1.background:
I have been to Japan, and I found the culture to be very different from my own
sometimes i volunteer at an urban farm.
I'm a busy person with a lot of demands on my time.
My heart breaks when my grandchildren are sad.
I enjoy performing on stage, because it gives me a chance to express myself and connect with others.

participant_2.background:
I like to stay active and learn new things in my free time.
i love watching game of thrones.
I enjoy the food network and HGTV while I'm on my diet.
I'm a foodie who lives far from my family but loves to eat at restaurants.
I love to listen to rap music on YouTube and read about my favorite charities on their websites.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks! How are you?
I'm doing well too, thanks for asking! I'm just getting ready to go to work.
Oh, cool! What do you do for work?
I'm a nurse at a local hospital.
Oh, that's awesome! I'm sure you're a great nurse.
Thank you! I try my best.
What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love helping people and making a difference in their lives.
That's really great! I'm sure you're a great role model for your patients.
Thank you! That means a lot.
I'm sure you have a lot of interesting stories from your time as a nurse.
I do! I'd love to tell you some of them sometime.
Maybe we can get coffee sometime and I can tell you some of my stories.
That sounds like a great idea
